partnerDetails.about: The company was founded in 1996 by Imran Karolia, a dedicated and experienced electrician who previously worked at Eskom.  Mr Karolia is a home grown industry professional who started BK from humble beginnings with limited space and limited stock, but with lots of vigour and steadfastness.He had an uncanny  vision to set an industry benchmark for outstanding customer service in the South African electrical wholesale sector.
